articles.title: Astronomers watch a massive star collapse into a black hole without a supernova
articles.description: A massive star 2.5 million light-years away simply vanished — and astronomers now know why. Instead of exploding in a supernova, it quietly collapsed into a black hole, shedding its outer layers in a slow-motion cosmic fade-out. articles.title: Not only is Lake Powell's water level plummeting because of drought, its total capacity is shrinking, too
